title: Woman Getting Haircut

nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
The way someone's hair is cut.
The style in which hair has been cut

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman getting a haircut emoji depicts a serene individual with smooth, rounded features and a gentle expression, seated while a stylist's scissors are subtly implied near her hair. Apple's characteristic realistic lighting and soft gradients create a sense of calm and personal care, highlighting the smooth texture of her hair. This emoji is commonly used to represent self-care, transformation, a fresh start, or the simple act of visiting a salon.
